source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_all_appeals

AS

SELECT
    appealrefnumber,
    lastmodified,
    procedurecode,
    decisioncod,
    linkedappeal,
    lpacode,
    applicationtype,
    appealtypereason,
    appealtypereasonid,
    appealtypegroup,
    appealtype,
    rcrissue1,
    appealrecdate,
    appealstartdate,
    appealdecideddate,
    appealwithdrawndate,
    appealturnedawaydate,
    appeallapseddate,
    redetermined,
    jurisdiction,
    daysinabeyance,
    leadcase,
    leadcaseworktype,
    leadproceduretype,
    developmenttype,
    caseofficerName,
    caseofficerlogin,
    leadcaseofficername,
    leadcaseofficelogin,
    currentactivetaskgrp,
    expected_from
FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_all_appeals
GROUP BY 
    appealrefnumber,
    lastmodified,
    procedurecode,
    decisioncod,
    linkedappeal,
    lpacode,
    applicationtype,
    appealtypereason,
    appealtypereasonid,
    appealtypegroup,
    appealtype,
    rcrissue1,
    appealrecdate,
    appealstartdate,
    appealdecideddate,
    appealwithdrawndate,
    appealturnedawaydate,
    appeallapseddate,
    redetermined,
    jurisdiction,
    daysinabeyance,
    leadcase,
    leadcaseworktype,
    leadproceduretype,
    developmenttype,
    caseofficerName,
    caseofficerlogin,
    leadcaseofficername,
    leadcaseofficelogin,
    currentactivetaskgrp,
    expected_from

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_all_additional_appeal

AS

SELECT 
    ST1.appealrefnumber,
    ST1.lastmodified,
    ST1.decisiondate,
    ST1.decisionsubmitdate,
    ST1.bespokeindicator,
    ST1.bespoketargetdate,
    ST1.processingstate,
    ST1.linkstatus,
    ST1.casecloseddate,
    ST1.pcsappealwithdrawndate,
    ST1.numberofresidences,
    ST1.appealsdocumentscomplete,
    ST1.questionnairereceived,
    ST1.lpaconditionsreceived,
    ST1.lpaconditionsforwarded,
    ST1.statementsdue,
    ST1.lpastatementsubmitted,
    ST1.lpastatementforwarded,
    ST1.appellantstatementsubmitted,
    ST1.appellantstatementforwarded,
    ST1.finalcommentsdue,
    ST1.lpacommentssubmitted,
    ST1.lpacommentsforwarded,
    ST1.statementofcommongrounddue,
    ST1.statementofcommongroundreceived,
    ST1.appellantcommentssubmitted,
    ST1.appellantcommentsforwarded,
    ST1.thirdpartyrepsdue,
    ST1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded,
    ST1.sitenoticesent,
    ST1.proofsdue,
    ST1.lpaproofssubmitted,
    ST1.lpaproofsforwarded,
    ST1.appellantsproofssubmitted,
    ST1.appellantsproofsforwarded,
    ST1.areaofsiteinhectares,
    ST1.dateofdecisionifissued,
    ST1.typeofapplication,
    ST1.appealsourceindicator,
    ST1.developmentorallegation,
    ST1.amountdue,
    ST1.sitegreenbelt,
    ST1.lpaapplicationreference,
    ST1.lpaapplicationdate,
    ST1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered,
    ST1.daterecovered,
    ST1.callindate,
    ST2.caseprocess,
    ST2.caseworkmarker,
    ST2.costsappliedforindicator,
    ST2.level,
    ST2.procedureappellant,
    ST2.procedurelpa,
    ST2.proceduredetermineddate,
    ST2.targetdate,
    ST2.agriculturalholding,
    ST2.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,
    ST2.floorspaceinsquaremetres,
    ST2.sitegridreferenceeasting,
    ST2.sitegridreferencenorthing,
    ST2.historicbuildinggrantmade,
    ST2.incarelatestoca,
    ST2.inspectorneedtoentersite,
    ST2.isfloodinganissue,
    ST2.isthesitewithinanaonb,
    ST2.sitewithinsssi,
    ST1.expected_from
    FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_additional_data ST1 
    FULL JOIN odw_standardised_db.horizon_add_additional_data ST2 ON ST1.appealrefnumber = ST2.appealrefnumber AND ST1.expected_from = ST2.expected_from
    GROUP BY ST1.appealrefnumber,lastmodified,decisiondate,decisionsubmitdate,bespokeindicator,bespoketargetdate,processingstate,linkstatus,casecloseddate,pcsappealwithdrawndate,
numberofresidences,appealsdocumentscomplete,questionnairereceived,lpaconditionsreceived,lpaconditionsforwarded,statementsdue,lpastatementsubmitted,lpastatementforwarded,
appellantstatementsubmitted,appellantstatementforwarded,finalcommentsdue,lpacommentssubmitted,lpacommentsforwarded,statementofcommongrounddue,statementofcommongroundreceived,
appellantcommentssubmitted,appellantcommentsforwarded,thirdpartyrepsdue,thirdpartyrepsforwarded,sitenoticesent,proofsdue,lpaproofssubmitted,lpaproofsforwarded,
appellantsproofssubmitted,appellantsproofsforwarded,areaofsiteinhectares,dateofdecisionifissued,typeofapplication,appealsourceindicator,developmentorallegation,
amountdue,sitegreenbelt,lpaapplicationreference,lpaapplicationdate,datenotrecoveredorderecovered,daterecovered,callindate,caseprocess,caseworkmarker,
costsappliedforindicator,level,procedureappellant,procedurelpa,proceduredetermineddate,targetdate,agriculturalholding,developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,
floorspaceinsquaremetres,sitegridreferenceeasting,sitegridreferencenorthing,historicbuildinggrantmade,incarelatestoca,inspectorneedtoentersite,isfloodinganissue,isthesitewithinanaonb,
sitewithinsssi, ST1.expected_from;

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_hedgerow

AS

SELECT 
    category,
    type,
    proceure,
    lpa_code,
    lpa_name,
    appeal_reference_number,
    rejected_or_withdrawn,
    appeal_withdrawn_date,
    visit_type,
    appellant,
    site_address_postcode,
    revieved_date,
    valid_date,
    start_date,
    event_date,
    decision_date,
    decision,
    open_or_closed,
    linked,
    case_officer_name,
    case_officer_login,
    processing_state,
    expected_from
    -- ref_year,
    -- identifier,
    -- full_ref,
    -- horizn_ref,
    -- processing_state,
    -- lpa,
    -- receipt_date,
    -- name_of_appellant,
    -- agent,
    -- site_address,
    -- postcode,
    -- corr,
    -- case_officer,
    -- appeal_type,
    -- withdrawn_or_rejected,
    -- date_wd_or_r,
    -- acknow_date,
    -- valid_date,
    -- start_date,
    -- 2_week_date,
    -- 6_week_date,
    -- 9_week_date,
    -- questionnaire_received,
    -- inspector,
    -- procedure,
    -- event_date,
    -- date_sent_to_inspector,
    -- date_rec_from_insp,
    -- decision,
    -- reader_sent_to,
    -- date_decision_issued,
    -- target_date,
    -- notes,
    -- put_away,
    -- pa_barcode,
    -- ready_for_event,
    -- receipt_to_start_average,
    -- start_to_event_average,
    -- event_to_decision_average,
    -- receipt_to_decision_average,
    -- handle_time_in_weeks,
    -- decision_month,
    -- open_or_closed,
    -- old_case_off_not_to_be_used,
    -- expected_from
    FROM odw_standardised_db.casework_specialist_hedgerow
    GROUP BY category,
    type,
    proceure,
    lpa_code,
    lpa_name,
    appeal_reference_number,
    rejected_or_withdrawn,
    appeal_withdrawn_date,
    visit_type,
    appellant,
    site_address_postcode,
    revieved_date,
    valid_date,
    start_date,
    event_date,
    decision_date,
    decision,
    open_or_closed,
    linked,
    case_officer_name,
    case_officer_login,
    processing_state,
    expected_from
    -- ref_year,
    -- identifier,
    -- full_ref,
    -- horizn_ref,
    -- processing_state,
    -- lpa,
    -- receipt_date,
    -- name_of_appellant,
    -- agent,
    -- site_address,
    -- postcode,
    -- corr,
    -- case_officer,
    -- appeal_type,
    -- withdrawn_or_rejected,
    -- date_wd_or_r,
    -- acknow_date,
    -- valid_date,
    -- start_date,
    -- 2_week_date,
    -- 6_week_date,
    -- 9_week_date,
    -- questionnaire_received,
    -- inspector,
    -- procedure,
    -- event_date,
    -- date_sent_to_inspector,
    -- date_rec_from_insp,
    -- decision,
    -- reader_sent_to,
    -- date_decision_issued,
    -- target_date,
    -- notes,
    -- put_away,
    -- pa_barcode,
    -- ready_for_event,
    -- receipt_to_start_average,
    -- start_to_event_average,
    -- event_to_decision_average,
    -- receipt_to_decision_average,
    -- handle_time_in_weeks,
    -- decision_month,
    -- open_or_closed,
    -- old_case_off_not_to_be_used,

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_high_hedge

AS

SELECT 
    ref,
    full_ref,
    linked_with,
    horizon_ref,
    processing_state,
    rejected_withdrawn,
    date_withdrawn_rejected,
    case_officer,
    date_received,
    lpa,
    appellant,
    agent,
    status,
    1st_line_of_address,
    site_post_code,
    other_party,
    lpa_decision,
    valid_date,
    start_date,
    docs_copied,
    q_due,
    qu_rec,
    notification_of_site_visit,
    date_of_sv,
    time_of_sv,
    inspector,
    date_sent_to_inspector,
    date_returned_from_inspector,
    reader,
    pins_decision,
    date_of_decision,
    comments,
    pa_date,
    pa_barcode,
    target_80_within_24_weeks_from_receipt_to_decision_target_relates_to_cases_received_on_or_after_1_april_2011,
    hande_time_in_weeks,
    decision_month,
    receipt_to_start,
    start_to_event,
    event_to_decision,
    receipt_to_decision,
    open_or_closed,
    ready_for_event,
    expected_from

    FROM odw_standardised_db.casework_specialist_hh

    GROUP BY ref,
    full_ref,
    linked_with,
    horizon_ref,
    processing_state,
    rejected_withdrawn,
    date_withdrawn_rejected,
    case_officer,
    date_received,
    lpa,
    appellant,
    agent,
    status,
    1st_line_of_address,
    site_post_code,
    other_party,
    lpa_decision,
    valid_date,
    start_date,
    docs_copied,
    q_due,
    qu_rec,
    notification_of_site_visit,
    date_of_sv,
    time_of_sv,
    inspector,
    date_sent_to_inspector,
    date_returned_from_inspector,
    reader,
    pins_decision,
    date_of_decision,
    comments,
    pa_date,
    pa_barcode,
    target_80_within_24_weeks_from_receipt_to_decision_target_relates_to_cases_received_on_or_after_1_april_2011,
    hande_time_in_weeks,
    decision_month,
    receipt_to_start,
    start_to_event,
    event_to_decision,
    receipt_to_decision,
    open_or_closed,
    ready_for_event,
    expected_from
